application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Numbers and Letters are associated with trees location on the tree sketch plan. Annual tree works to maintain the health & shape of the trees. F1. Olive: About 400mm off 6m left, F2. Photinia: Trim 1 & 3 about 300mm leaving about 4m. 5. Robinia: Deadwood, reduce crown 20% and balance. E. Laurus: Reduce 1x large limb into Taxus. Remaining Laurus to be lightly trimmed on garden side. Reduce 400mm leaving 8m. 13. Holm Oak: Prune to last year levels, particularly on the rear, reducing over by around 600mm, leaving 5m. 16. Acacia: Trim over reducing by 15%. Remove 400mm leaving 10m. 17. Holm Oak: Prune to last year levels, particularly on the rear, reducing over by around 600mm leaving 6m. 18. Holm Oak: Prune to last year levels, particularly on the rear, reducing over by around 600mm leaving 6m. 22. Acacia: Trim shape reduce 400mm leaving 8m. 25. Cherry: Trim reduce 300mm leaving 6m. 27. Gledistia: Trim and shape, trim 400mm leaving 8m. 29. Robinia: Deadwood, reduce leaders reduce tree to 6m. 31. Gledistia: Reduce leaders by 1m Leaving 6m. 33. Gleditsia: Reduce leaders growing into the Sorbus (tree34.) reduce 600mm leaving 8m. 34,38. Sorbus: Deadwood and shape, reduce 400mm leaving 8m. 35,37,39. Conifer Hedges: Trim to previous levels, reduce 400mm leaving 4m. 40.Taxus Hedge: Trim top down to roof height and side to last year's levels, remove 300mm leaving 4m. P (by gate): Shape and trim reduce 600mm leaving 12m. Laurus E,F,G,H: Trim with a hedge trimmer remove 300mm leaving 6m. S,T Betula: Trim. Trim off 400mm leaving 6m.
